description: Enter the email address(es), separated by commas, that will receive ALL admin notices from the site.
name: allnoticerecipients
label: ALL admin notice recipients

description: Main geographical location of your site. Used for SEO (Search Engine Optimization).
name: sitegeographiclocation
label: Geographical Location

description: Enter how you'd like your organization's name displayed on the website. This also is inserted in the title tags and is used for SEO (Search Engine Optimization).
name: sitedisplayname
label: Site Name

description: Enter the Time Zone of your site.
name: defaulttimezone
label: Time Zone

description: The main URL of your site. This is used to generate links within the software so it is important that it remains the same.
name: siteurl
label: Site URL

description: Name of the person that appears in the signature of the contact form submission email.
name: sitecontactname
label: Contact Name

description: E-mail address of the person that appears in the signature of the contact form submission email.
name: sitecontactemail
label: Contact Email

description: Name of your site owner or primary site administrator.
name: admincontactname
label: Administrator Name

description: E-Mail address of your site owner or primary site administrator.
name: admincontactemail
label: Administrator Email

description: Name of Your webmaster.
name: sitewebmaster
label: Webmaster Name

description: E-Mail address of your webmaster.
name: sitewebmasteremail
label: Webmaster Email

description: The primary, physical address of your website or business.
name: sitemailingaddress
label: Address

description: If you have a merchant account, enter the name of the merchant account service provider. Check out the help file on how to set up online payment.
name: merchantaccount
label: Merchant Account

description: The Merchant Account Test Mode Feature is currently not available.
name: merchanttestmode
label: Merchant Test Mode

description: The Merchant Auto Redirect feature is currently not available.
name: merchantautoredirect
label: Merchant Auto Redirect

description: Optional: Provide a link to the Merchant Logo to be used when redirected to a different site.
name: merchantlogo
label: Merchant Logo

description: Merchant Authorize Only is a true/false variable indicating whether to just authorize payment or authorize and process payment.  If true, then merchant only authorizes the order, but holds off on processing until a later time.
name: merchantauthorizeonly
label: Merchant Authorize Only

description: Merchant CC Accepted displays what credit cards are accepted by the merchant. ie Visa, Mastercard, Amex
name: merchantccaccepted
label: Merchant CC Accepted

description: Keywords that your site will automatically populate within the keywords meta tag, Page titles and other locations on many modules.
name: siteprimarykeywords
label: Primary Keywords

description: Secondary Keywords that your site will automatically populate within keywords meta tag, Page titles and other locations on many modules.
name: sitesecondarykeywords
label: Secondary Keywords

description: CompanyTax ID Number is Your Organization's tax id number
name: taxidnumber
label: Tax ID Number

description: Select true if you want to include Captcha codes on your forms and false to turn them off.  This effects all forms site-wide.
name: captcha
label: Use Captcha

description: Currency your site is using.
name: currency
label: Currency

description: Symbol to place before the currency.
name: currencysymbol
label: Currency Symbol

description: The phone number of your site or business.
name: sitephonenumber
label: Phone Number

description: Enter the address that will be shown as the sender when the system sends out emails.
name: siteemailnoreplyaddress
label: No-Reply Address

description: Select the language for your site to translate. Most words will be translated.
name: localizationlanguage
label: Localization Language

description: Link or text containing your site policies.
name: sitepolicy
label: Site Policy

description: These are the API Credentials required to access the ConstantContact.com API.  It requires additional customization to integrate with your site, please contact support@tendenci.com if you'd like this for an estimate.
name: constantcontactapicredentials
label: Constant Contact API Credentials

description: Enter your Google Analytics web stats tracking UA number to start tracking stats on your website. You will need to first sign up at http://www.google.com/analytics/. Ex: UA-12345678-9
name: semgoogleanalyticsprofileid
label: Google Analytics UA Number

description: The Google API key is used to integrate with Google tools (e.g. GeoCoding).
name: googleapikey
label: Google API Key

description:
Show options for date formatting
a  'a.m.' or 'p.m.' (Note that this is slightly different than PHP's output, because this includes periods to match Associated Press style.)
A  'AM' or 'PM'.
b  Month, textual, 3 letters, lowercase.
B  Not implemented.
c  ISO 8601 Format.
d  Day of the month, 2 digits with leading zeros.
D  Day of the week, textual, 3 letters.
f  Time, in 12-hour hours and minutes, with minutes left off if they're zero. Proprietary extension.
F  Month, textual, long.
g  Hour, 12-hour format without leading zeros.
G  Hour, 24-hour format without leading zeros.
h  Hour, 12-hour format.
H  Hour, 24-hour format.
i  Minutes.
I  Not implemented.
j  Day of the month without leading zeros.
l  Day of the week, textual, long.
L  Boolean for whether it's a leap year.
m  Month, 2 digits with leading zeros.
M  Month, textual, 3 letters.
n  Month without leading zeros.
N  Month abbreviation in Associated Press style. Proprietary extension.
O  Difference to Greenwich time in hours.
P  Time, in 12-hour hours, minutes and 'a.m.'/'p.m.', with minutes left off if they're zero and the special-case strings 'midnight and 'noon' if appropriate. Proprietary extension.
r  RFC 2822 formatted date.
s  Seconds, 2 digits with leading zeros.
S  English ordinal suffix for day of the month, 2 characters.
t  Number of days in the given month.
T  Time zone of this machine.
u  Microseconds.
U  Seconds since the Unix Epoch (January 1 1970 00:00:00 UTC).
w  Day of the week, digits without leading zeros.
W  ISO-8601 week number of year, with weeks starting on Monday.
y  Year, 2 digits.
Y  Year, 4 digits.
z  Day of the year.
Z  Time zone offset in seconds. The offset for timezones west of UTC is always negative, and for those east of UTC is always positive.
name: dateformat
label: Date Format

description: A global site setting for a url for users to redirect to when they first login. Site setting to redirect non-admin users to a specific page. Can be /dashboard, /profiles/, or a custom instruction page
name: profile_redirect
label: Profile Redirect

description: Select whether or not this site is paid or is still on free trial.
name: freepaid
label: Free or Paid

description: This is the date when the site was created.
name: sitecreatedt
label: Site Create Date

description: This is the payment URL to activate the site if the site is the free one.
name: siteactivatepaymenturl
label: Site Activate Payment URL

description: Select the partner hosting this site.
name: partner
label: Hosting Partner

description: Select the name of the form that will be used at /contact/.
name: contact_form
label: Contact Form

description: Enter a NAICS (North American Industry Classification System) number for the organization. Full list and lookup is available on the US Census website.
name: naics
label: NAICS Number

description: This setting determines whether or not the site will use a global search index. The search index is used to search content in individual apps and to search across apps.
name: searchindex
label: Use Global Search Index

description: This setting determines whether your website is visible to search engines like Google and Yahoo. Private will block search engines, Public will allow them in, and Custom will let you customize this in your theme. The default for the custom option is the same as private.
name: robotstxt
label: Search Engine Visibility (robots.txt)
